senses.sense_definition: Relating to a poetic rhythm where two short, unstressed syllables are followed by one long, stressed syllable.

examples.text: The <w>anapestic</w> meter creates a galloping rhythm that is often used in comic verse.
She analyzed the <w>anapestic</w> structure of the famous limerick during class.

senses.sense_definition: A line of verse or a poem written using anapestic meter.

examples.text: The poet experimented with <w>anapestics</w> to capture the sound of horses running.
Reading <w>anapestics</w> aloud requires paying close attention to the stress pattern.
